title: Udaipur sees more big hotels as tourist flows hit new highs
description: Udaipur is witnessing a boom in the hospitality industry with new luxury and mid-market hotels being launched by major brands like Wyndham, Radisson, and IHCL. The city's popularity as a tourist destination has attracted international chains and boosted investments, driven by an increase in domestic tourism and big-ticket weddings.
